Header.title: ICI Fest 2022
Header.paragraph: Swami Keshvanad Institute of Technology, Management and Gramothan, Jaipur

About.paragraph: ICI fest plays an important role in the curriculum of a college. It is one such event at Swami Keshvanand Institute of Technology and Management , Gramothan, Jaipur, where young brains get to showcase their skills and compete with others to find the best. It is not just about the competitions but also an arena where a lot of those new ideas are seen live, learnt and inspired

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: Inauguration of Civil Expo with High Tea
Initiation of Charcha se Samadhan, Technical Events, Workshops

Services.name: SERIES OF EVENTS
Services.text: Events to be conducted to foster realistic approach in young budding engineers.

Services.name: INTERACTIVE SEMINARS
Services.text: Interactive seminars sessions to be conducted to enable the students and teach them the essential skills to start in the field.

Services.name: WORKSHOPS & EXHIBITION
Services.text: Workshops and exhibition to beconducted to develop new prowess and build brand proximity.
